description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. In a place where war and politics have the same meaning, you must complete several missions to save your planet from the opposing government’s hostile takeover!
description.short: In a place where war and politics have the same meaning, you must complete several missions to save your planet from the opposing government’s hostile takeover!
